articles.description: Patients whose cancer was getting worse or spreading were more than five times more likely to die in the space of a month if they caught Covid-19, researchers told a meeting of the American Society of Clinical Oncology this week.

articles.description: Danielle Gletow and her organization, One Simple Wish, are making sure children in foster care -- and those who have aged out of the system -- have the support they need during the pandemic.
articles.content:

articles.description: CNN's Don Lemon reacts to the FBI's call for more information regarding the death of George Floyd, an African-American man who was killed after a Minneapolis police officer used his knee on Floyd's neck to pin him -- unarmed and handcuffed -- to the ground.

articles.author: Kristen Rogers, CNN
articles.title: Cannabis was used for religious rites at a biblical site in Israel, study finds
articles.description: Materials on altars from a religious shrine in Beer-sheba Valley, in Israel's biblical site Tel Arad, contained cannabis and frankincense, a study found. It's the first time physical evidence of cannabis has been identified in the Ancient Near East.

articles.author: Dan Merica, CNN
articles.title: Nevada Sen. Catherine Cortez Masto pulls name from Biden running mate consideration
articles.description: Nevada Sen. Catherine Cortez Masto announced on Thursday that she was withdrawing her name from former Vice President Joe Biden's search for a running mate.
